attributes.action: Raise wages for NHS Doctors, Nurses, and Paramedics.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is struggling due to staff shortages. Should the wage be increased to a respectable standard for our Doctors, Nurses and Paramedics, in line with the amazing work they do. We may encourage and invoke more interest for students/trainees to pursue a career in the NHS.
attributes.background: To raise the wages of NHS Doctors, Nurses, and Paramedics.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase pay for all NHS workers by 5%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607055

Increase NHS Staff pay by 10%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610647

The Government has recently accepted the recommendations from the independent NHS pay review bodies regarding pay increases for NHS staff. You can find out what has been agreed here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/nhs-staff-to-receive-pay-rise
